modName: The Hood of The Narcoleptic Thief
summary: This mod is just for sh*ts \'n giggles.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is just for sh*ts \'n giggles. Me and a friend thought it would be hilarious if there was a narcoleptic thief, i don\'t know why, it was 4am okay? Anyway i made this hood that paralyses you every now and then for 5 seconds. Yeah. Fun right?

To get it open the console and type player.additem xx000D65 1

I tried it out, it\'s actually quite funny sometimes.

...sometimes.

...maybe just once.
author: Dominoes666
